title: Pre-Service Teacher Training Program for Strengthening Mathematics Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding elementary mathematics basic concepts and at least three years of classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: A math learning design competency development program for elementary school teachers to strengthen 21st-century skills. Emphasizes smartphone-based activities in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Participants can complete three or more differentiated math lesson designs by applying learning design-based pedagogies.
Participants improve collaborative learning competencies by over 80% through a learning activity design process incorporating peer feedback.
Participants can measure and improve the effectiveness of learning designs three or more times using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
